Articles.Content:
Hello,

I tried looking for this info, but if the info is out there I'm too dim to find it...

KSP is 39.99€ on Stream and 19,99€ in the Store here. Is there a difference between the two, or am I missing something?

Thanks.

Edited February 27, 2017 by Jarulf
spelling, spelling!

Hi @Jarulf, KSP is currently on sale on the Squad store, it often goes on sale on one or two of the approved vendor sites, these are the Squad store (obviously), Steam, GoG, Green Man Gaming, Humble Bundle, and Amazon.

39.99€ is the regular non-sale price.

Squad has offered KSP at 25%, 40% and 50% (once, in the last Steam the winter sale) off the sale price, with 40% off being the most common.

Hope this helps.

As simple as that :-)

Thank you for the explanation.
Last cristmeas it was on sale for 66% or about 17€
Well, I just bought it. And it looks really fun, not that I understand anything, not really :-) Still, working my through the training scenarios.
